title: Barbecued Sirloin Steak with Salsa Verde and Tomato Salad

ingredients.item: 2 Waitrose Aberdeen Angus Sirloin Steaks, each weighing approximately 200g, from the Service Counter
2 garlic cloves, peeled and roughly chopped

instructions.step: Preheat the barbecue or grill.  In a blender, whizz together all the salsa ingredients to make a smooth sauce  Score one side of each steak in a criss-cross pattern with a sharp knife, cutting only about one third of the way into the surface. Spread 1 tbsp of the salsa over each scored side.  Cook the steaks for 3-5 minutes on each side until cooked to your liking.  Serve the steaks with an extra spoonful of salsa verde, a salad of red and yellow cherry tomatoes and buttered steamed new potatoes.
